front.title: IEEE Approved Draft Recommended Practice for Learning Technology - ISO 21000-2:2005 Information Technology -- Multimedia Framework (MPEG-21) -- Part 2: Digital Item Declaration Mapping to the Conceptual Model for Resource Aggregation
front.abstract: This recommended practice specifies how the elements and attributes defined in Multimedia Framework (MPEG21) -Part 2: Digital Item Declaration relate to the components of the conceptual model for resource aggregation defined in IEEE Std 1484.13.1-2012
